title: How famous is Ataturk in the world? - Quora
tags: Mustafa Kemal Atatürk (founder of the Republic of Turkey)

response.answer_text: He is very famous, though not always in a good way… eg, 2 billion (1/3) of the planet’s population is Muslim and know of him, but many hate him because he was not a supporter of Sunnism and leaned towards the Shia branch of Islam. He is very famous amongst Jews and Secularists, for he is known to have a Jewish education and background, and also by Scientists, in particular Albert Einstein, who famously said that Ataturk was the 3rd most intelligent person in the world after he himself (Einstein) being the 1st, his wife (Einsteins wife) being the 2nd, then Ataturk being the 3rd.. In the political scene, the educated politicians know of him, maybe Trump or Bush won’t know, but even Ghandi knew of him.. saying “ Until i saw Ataturk, i used to think the British were God” etc And let’s not forget the 40 Turkic tribes of Turan, who in total make up 285 Million Turks from Turkey to north China, who now speak a single universal language known as “Turkish” thanks to Ataturk’s language reform.. Quote from actor Jackie Chan “ In China Ataturk is taught in schools by force, if you do not know Ataturk, then that means that you know nothing at all ”

Atatürk is well-known to the peoples of underdog countries of the world, as a beacon of hope that you can push against savage colonialism and succeed.
